resources.string:
1. Tilt the device left and right to move the ship.

2.Tap the screen to shoot lasers.

3. Shoot as many asteroids as you possibly can.

4.Make sure you don't get hit or you will lose life points!

5.The longer you go the higher the points!

Enjoy!

Asteroids Images - Motosume \(Deviant Art\)
Backgrounds - Frostbo\(Deviant Art\)
Ship Rendering - Millionth
Fireball - Creative Commons
Music and Effects - Looperman
